item.title: How to scrape data from Google Sheets in R
item.description: Google Forms offers a convenient way to collect data online. It is particularly useful because you can embed the form in a webpage, link the results with a spreadsheet and publish the results online. This post shows how to scrape the data from the spreadsheet (google form) in r using the package RCurl. You should be able to follow along by copying and pasting the code into an R session.
